concept.title: Avoiding writing for output
concept.shortdesc: Do not include formatting information in your DITA content topics.

conbody.p: If you find that you are deliberately coding your DITA topics in such a way as to achieve a particular output effect, you are without doubt taking the wrong path. DITA topics must be delivery-agnostic; they must be free of as much context (how the information is going to be used, presented or sequenced) as possible.
